results.definition: lacking a sense of security or affording no ease or reassurance
examples: farmers were uneasy until rain finally came
uneasy lies the head that wears the crown
an uneasy silence fell on the group

results.definition: lacking or not affording physical or mental rest
examples: she fell into an uneasy sleep

results.definition: causing or fraught with or showing anxiety
examples: spent an anxious night waiting for the test results

results.definition: socially uncomfortable; unsure and constrained in manner
examples: ill at ease among eddies of people he didn't know

results.definition: relating to bodily unease that causes discomfort
